channel.title: [Delta] Yell titles
channel.description:
Okay mopar, I'm back with another error.. :|
So, I was adding my yell titles and they all work fine, except for the special one. So, here's the code for it. [code] if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase == "mista pnut") { titles = "[The Boss] -"; } [/code]
And this is the error I get. [code]client.java:7314: cannot find symbol symbol : variable equalsIgnoreCase location: class java.lang.String if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase == "mista pnut") { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
[b]Please help! [/b]

item.title: [Delta] Yell titles

item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Thank-you sir. Can’t believe I forgot something so simple…

item.title: [Delta] Yell titles
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Okay mopar, I’m back with another error…

So, I was adding my yell titles and they all work fine, except for the special one. So, here’s the code for it.

				if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase == "mista pnut") {
					titles = "[The Boss] -";
				}

And this is the error I get.

client.java:7314: cannot find symbol symbol : variable equalsIgnoreCase location: class java.lang.String if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase == "mista pnut") { ^ 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

Please help!

Read full topic
